message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $22,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $18,000 for it.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. How about we meet in the middle at $20,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to go above $17,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $17,000 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to close the deal right now for $19,000.  This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I am only able to offer $18,000 for the product.
